lom:description.lom:string:
This is a course syllabus offered at department of Communication Studies, Concordia University. "The course will explore technology's interaction with the concept of gender how the terms of gender are embodied in technologies, and conversely, how technologies shape our notions of gender. This course will give students the opportunity to critically assess the gendered relations produced in areas such as entertainment and games, work, domesticity, identity,education, race and ethnicity, and the body."
keywords:NCWIT (Naional Center for Women and Information Technology), gender equity

lom:title.lom:string: bodies + machines--interrogating gender + technology in the digital age
